description: Ajlan & Bros Real Estate Company is participating in this event as a Diamond Partner. This step reflects its growing position in the real estate sector and its role in supporting the objectives of Saudi Vision 2030.Through its pavilion, the company will showcase its major projects.The company's pavilion will also offer visitors a comprehensive interactive experience to learn about project details. Additionally, the company will announce valuable raffles and prizes, including thirty iPhone 17 devices to be distributed over the first three days, and a final draw for two Land Cruiser 2025 cars on the day before the last and the last day. Furthermore, the event will feature the signing of several strategic agreements with local and international partners, supporting the company's position in the real estate market.Ajlan & Bros Real Estate is one of the Ajlan & Bros Group companies and is a pioneer in real estate development in the Kingdom. It focuses on developing high-quality residential, commercial, and logistical projects based on an approach rooted in innovation, sustainability, and supporting quality of life, aligning with the Kingdom’s ambition to become a leading global destination for urban development.
htmlDescription:
Ajlan & Bros Real Estate Company is participating in this event as a Diamond Partner. This step reflects its growing position in the real estate sector and its role in supporting the objectives of Saudi Vision 2030.


Through its pavilion, the company will showcase its major projects.


The company's pavilion will also offer visitors a comprehensive interactive experience to learn about project details. Additionally, the company will announce valuable raffles and prizes, including thirty iPhone 17 devices to be distributed over the first three days, and a final draw for two Land Cruiser 2025 cars on the day before the last and the last day. Furthermore, the event will feature the signing of several strategic agreements with local and international partners, supporting the company's position in the real estate market.


Ajlan & Bros Real Estate is one of the Ajlan & Bros Group companies and is a pioneer in real estate development in the Kingdom. It focuses on developing high-quality residential, commercial, and logistical projects based on an approach rooted in innovation, sustainability, and supporting quality of life, aligning with the Kingdom’s ambition to become a leading global destination for urban development.

name: Anhui Sentai Trading Co, Ltd
description: Anhui Sentai Trading Co., Ltd. is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Anhui Sentai WPC Group Share Co., Ltd. and sells the full range of products manufactured by the parent company. Anhui Sentai WPC Group Share Co., Ltd., established in 2006, focuses on the research, design, production, and sales of WPC materials, new SPC materials, and related products. Sentai operates more than 200 production lines, serves customers in over 60 countries and regions, and achieves an annual export volume exceeding $100 million. The company is committed to R&D and innovation and holds over 170 patents. Our robust R&D capabilities enable us to offer a variety of products that meet the diverse needs of our customers. Our latest products include PU-coated WPC and digital printing products. Sentai’s products are recyclable and environmentally friendly, and we are committed to contributing to a sustainable future for all.
htmlDescription: Anhui Sentai Trading Co., Ltd. is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Anhui Sentai WPC Group Share Co., Ltd. and sells the full range of products manufactured by the parent company. The company is committed to R&D and innovation and holds over 170 patents. Our robust R&D capabilities enable us to offer a variety of products that meet the diverse needs of our customers. Our latest products include PU-coated WPC and digital printing products. Sentai’s products are recyclable and environmentally friendly, and we are committed to contributing to a sustainable future for all.

name: Four Directions
description: برؤية استراتيجية طموحة، انطلقت مسيرتنا في شركة الجهات الأربعة من مقرنا في مدينة الرياض في بداية عام 2014م، كمزود شامل لحلول الاستثمار والتطوير العقاري.نضيف في شركة الجهات الأربعة بعداً آخر للتميز والتفرد في قطاع الاستثمار والتطوير العقاري، بكفاءتنا العالية وممارساتنا الاحترافية ومسؤوليتنا البيئية الشاملة، تماشياً مع التوجهات الحكومية ورؤية المملكة 2030 الهادفة إلى تعزيز مفهوم العمران بمرافقه الخدمية المتكاملة.
htmlDescription:
برؤية استراتيجية طموحة، انطلقت مسيرتنا في شركة الجهات الأربعة من مقرنا في مدينة الرياض في بداية عام 2014م، كمزود شامل لحلول الاستثمار والتطوير العقاري.

نضيف في شركة الجهات الأربعة بعداً آخر للتميز والتفرد في قطاع الاستثمار والتطوير العقاري، بكفاءتنا العالية وممارساتنا الاحترافية ومسؤوليتنا البيئية الشاملة، تماشياً مع التوجهات الحكومية ورؤية المملكة 2030 الهادفة إلى تعزيز مفهوم العمران بمرافقه الخدمية المتكاملة.

name: GD Fysculpture Co.,Ltd
description: Fangyuan is one of the earliest professional team specializing in sculpture production, but also a larger set of professional design, production, exhibition and academic seminars as one of the comprehensive art and culture enterprises. We are supplier for many well-known artists at home and abroad to provide professional sculpture engineering services, including sculpture original design, design development, production, environmental garden planning, sculpture restoration, art rental, art planning, art furniture customization, 3D printing, etc.,we also work for hundreds of commercial real estate to provide planning, design, art, engineering integration of construction services.
htmlDescription: Fangyuan is one of the earliest professional team specializing in sculpture production, but also a larger set of professional design, production, exhibition and academic seminars as one of the comprehensive art and culture enterprises. We are supplier for many well-known artists at home and abroad to provide professional sculpture engineering services, including sculpture original design, design development, production, environmental garden planning, sculpture restoration, art rental, art planning, art furniture customization, 3D printing, etc.,we also work for hundreds of commercial real estate to provide planning, design, art, engineering integration of construction services.

name: Guangzhou Night Rainbow Photoelectric Technology Co., Ltd.
description: Established in 1997 with the mission of "making nights more beautiful," Guangzhou Night Rainbow Photoelectric Technology Co., Ltd. has focused on the field of art lighting for 28 years, pioneering the global lighting painting industry. The group owns seven subsidiary companies (including two national high-tech enterprises), specializing in creative lighting design, production, and technical services. Our clients span industries such as urban cultural tourism, commercial centers, real estate, and international premium brands (e.g., LAMER, LANCOME, GUCCI).With nearly 100 lighting technology patents, we have delivered artistic lighting solutions for major events, including the 2010 Guangzhou Asian Games, the 2019 CCTV Spring Festival Gala Jinggangshan Venue, and the 2024 Macau Light Festival. We have also been the key contributor to the Guangzhou International Light Festival for nine consecutive years. We have successfully completed over 10,000 projects to date, and through our ARTLAB platform, we collaborate with over 400 domestic and international artists, creating more than 1,000 works.In the future, Night Rainbow will continue to deepen the integration of "art + technology," accelerate global market expansion, and build a global light art ecosystem.
htmlDescription:
Established in 1997 with the mission of "making nights more beautiful," Guangzhou Night Rainbow Photoelectric Technology Co., Ltd. has focused on the field of art lighting for 28 years, pioneering the global lighting painting industry. The group owns seven subsidiary companies (including two national high-tech enterprises), specializing in creative lighting design, production, and technical services. Our clients span industries such as urban cultural tourism, commercial centers, real estate, and international premium brands (e.g., LAMER, LANCOME, GUCCI).


With nearly 100 lighting technology patents, we have delivered artistic lighting solutions for major events, including the 2010 Guangzhou Asian Games, the 2019 CCTV Spring Festival Gala Jinggangshan Venue, and the 2024 Macau Light Festival. We have also been the key contributor to the Guangzhou International Light Festival for nine consecutive years. We have successfully completed over 10,000 projects to date, and through our ARTLAB platform, we collaborate with over 400 domestic and international artists, creating more than 1,000 works.


In the future, Night Rainbow will continue to deepen the integration of "art + technology," accelerate global market expansion, and build a global light art ecosystem.

name: Heyazah | حيازة العقارية
description: تُعد حيازة العقارية إحدى الشركات الرائدة ضمن مجموعة أحمد السيف القابضة، وتعمل على تطوير مشاريع عقارية نوعية تعكس طموحات رؤية المملكة 2030وبخبرة تتجاوز 20 عامًا، وأكثر من 35 مشروعًا، وقيمة تطويرية تفوق 5 مليارات ريال، تتميز حيازة بقدرتها على تنفيذ مشاريع استثنائية في مواقع استراتيجية تمنح قيمة تطويرية عالية وأثرًا طويل المدى، لتعيد من خلالها تشكيل أسلوب الحياة العمراني في الرياضHeyazah Real Estate Development, a leading company under Ahmed Alsaif Holding, specializes in developing high-quality real estate projects that align with the ambitions of Saudi Vision 2030.With over 20 years of experience, more than 35 developments, and a total value exceeding SAR 5 billion , Heyazah is distinguished by its ability to deliver exceptional projects in strategic locations, offering high developmental value and long-term impact, while redefining modern urban living in Riyadh and beyond
htmlDescription:
تُعد حيازة العقارية إحدى الشركات الرائدة ضمن مجموعة أحمد السيف القابضة، وتعمل على تطوير مشاريع عقارية نوعية تعكس طموحات رؤية المملكة 2030

وبخبرة تتجاوز 20 عامًا، وأكثر من 35 مشروعًا، وقيمة تطويرية تفوق 5 مليارات ريال، تتميز حيازة بقدرتها على تنفيذ مشاريع استثنائية في مواقع استراتيجية تمنح قيمة تطويرية عالية وأثرًا طويل المدى، لتعيد من خلالها تشكيل أسلوب الحياة العمراني في الرياض

name: Azdan Real Estate Development & Investment Company
description: ازدان للتطوير والاستثمار العقاري ليست وليدة الساعة، بل هي امتداد لجهود كبيرة امتدت من الآباء إلى الأبناء، وبتطورات سعينا من خلالها أن نكون ضمن عجلة تطوير وازدهار اقتصاد مملكتنا الغالية.  تبنّى مجلس إدارة أزدان رؤية عقارية بمفهوم حديث يواكب تحقيق مكانة رائدة في تقديم المنتجات والخدمات العقارية المبتكرة في القطاع العقاري.

name: Olaat Development Company (OPM)
description: Olaat Group stands as a distinguished leader within Saudi Arabia's real estate sector, boasting a rich history of over 25 years specializing in property management and consultancy. Our legacy is built on trust as we provide tailored strategic solutions and forge enduring partnerships.Comprising five vibrant entities, Olaat Group includes:🔷Olaat Properties Management Co. ® (OPM)🔷Professional Brokerage Firm Co. ® (OMIX)🔷Olaat Valuation Co. ® (OPM VALUATION)🔷OPM Homes🔷Guest ReadyEach entity within the Olaat Group strategically contributes to offering comprehensive real estate solutions. We prioritize operational efficiency, client satisfaction, seamless transactions, informed decision-making, premium residential services, and meticulous property readiness for short-term rentals. Our integrated approach ensures that we meet diverse client needs with unwavering commitment to quality and client-centricity.At the core of our operations lie international standards coupled with local expertise. Our range of services covers both commercial and residential sectors, including:🔷Research & Consultancy🔷Valuation🔷Brokerage🔷Asset Management🔷Realestate Development🔷Property Management🔷Facilities Management🔷TawjeedEstablished in 1999, Olaat Group has been a pioneer within the industry, setting elevated standards. Our real estate portfolio comprises office towers, residential compounds, shopping malls, hotels, and various other properties. With a transparent approach, we have built connections with over 21,300 clients and tenants, solidifying our reputation in the Kingdom.By harnessing expert skillsets, collaborative approaches, spheres of influence, and cutting-edge technology, we continue to add significant value. Upholding our values and heritage, we remain dedicated to supporting Vision 2030 by empowering local entrepreneurs, promoting educational initiatives, and advocating for environmental sustainability.
htmlDescription:
Olaat Group stands as a distinguished leader within Saudi Arabia's real estate sector, boasting a rich history of over 25 years specializing in property management and consultancy. Our legacy is built on trust as we provide tailored strategic solutions and forge enduring partnerships.


Comprising five vibrant entities, Olaat Group includes:

🔷Olaat Properties Management Co. ® (OPM)

🔷Professional Brokerage Firm Co. ® (OMIX)

🔷Olaat Valuation Co. ® (OPM VALUATION)

🔷OPM Homes

🔷Guest Ready


Each entity within the Olaat Group strategically contributes to offering comprehensive real estate solutions. We prioritize operational efficiency, client satisfaction, seamless transactions, informed decision-making, premium residential services, and meticulous property readiness for short-term rentals. Our integrated approach ensures that we meet diverse client needs with unwavering commitment to quality and client-centricity.


At the core of our operations lie international standards coupled with local expertise. Our range of services covers both commercial and residential sectors, including:

🔷Research & Consultancy

🔷Valuation

🔷Brokerage

🔷Asset Management

🔷Realestate Development

🔷Property Management

🔷Facilities Management

🔷Tawjeed


Established in 1999, Olaat Group has been a pioneer within the industry, setting elevated standards. Our real estate portfolio comprises office towers, residential compounds, shopping malls, hotels, and various other properties. With a transparent approach, we have built connections with over 21,300 clients and tenants, solidifying our reputation in the Kingdom.


By harnessing expert skillsets, collaborative approaches, spheres of influence, and cutting-edge technology, we continue to add significant value. Upholding our values and heritage, we remain dedicated to supporting Vision 2030 by empowering local entrepreneurs, promoting educational initiatives, and advocating for environmental sustainability.

name: Urbas Middle East Real Estate Co.
Iris Ceramica Group
description: Sustainability, innovation and excellent quality for pioneering ceramic surfaces: Iris Ceramica Group develops and distributes high-end natural ceramic materials worldwide for innovative solutions and architecture projects. With over 60 years of business experience, the Group is present in over one hundred countries, with a very clear mission: to re-engineer ceramics to improve interaction between humans and the environment. The Group includes different brands recognised among the most important Italian manufacturers on the international scene. Ariostea, Fiandre, FMG - Fabbrica Marmi e Graniti, Iris Ceramica, Porcelaingres, SapienStone and Stonepeak, all proposing advanced solutions that blend design, technology and innovation, supporting the use of ceramics in unique fields of application.
htmlDescription:
Sustainability, innovation and excellent quality for pioneering ceramic surfaces: Iris Ceramica Group develops and distributes high-end natural ceramic materials worldwide for innovative solutions and architecture projects. With over 60 years of business experience, the Group is present in over one hundred countries, with a very clear mission: to re-engineer ceramics to improve interaction between humans and the environment.

The Group includes different brands recognised among the most important Italian manufacturers on the international scene. Ariostea, Fiandre, FMG - Fabbrica Marmi e Graniti, Iris Ceramica, Porcelaingres, SapienStone and Stonepeak, all proposing advanced solutions that blend design, technology and innovation, supporting the use of ceramics in unique fields of application.

name: Tahaluf Events Limited
description: Headquartered in Riyadh, Tahaluf brings together strategically important commercial communities from the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, the wider Gulf region, and from around the world to a portfolio of world-class exhibitions and digital platforms.Tahaluf is a joint venture partnership between Informa PLC, the world’s largest trade show organiser, the Saudi Federation for Cybersecurity, Programming and Drones (SAFCSP), and Events Investment Fund (EIF). Sela, the Saudi-owned event production company renowned for its creation of spectacular event experiences, intends to join the joint venture in the near future. In 2024 Tahaluf was responsible for the award-winning tech events LEAP & DeepFest, as well as 24 Fintech, the Global Health Exhibition, Cityscape Global, Black Hat MEA and CPHI.
htmlDescription:
Headquartered in Riyadh, Tahaluf brings together strategically important commercial communities from the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, the wider Gulf region, and from around the world to a portfolio of world-class exhibitions and digital platforms.


Tahaluf is a joint venture partnership between Informa PLC, the world’s largest trade show organiser, the Saudi Federation for Cybersecurity, Programming and Drones (SAFCSP), and Events Investment Fund (EIF). Sela, the Saudi-owned event production company renowned for its creation of spectacular event experiences, intends to join the joint venture in the near future.


In 2024 Tahaluf was responsible for the award-winning tech events LEAP & DeepFest, as well as 24 Fintech, the Global Health Exhibition, Cityscape Global, Black Hat MEA and CPHI.

name: Dongying Enternal New Type Building Materials Co., Ltd.
description: Dongying Enternal New Type Building Materials Co., Ltd. - The Expert in Aluminum-Plastic Co-extrusion ProfilesEstablished in 2015 with a total investment of 35 million RMB, Dongying Enternal New Type Building Materials Co., Ltd. is a high-tech enterprise specializing in the R&D, manufacturing, sales, and technical services of aluminum-plastic co-extrusion profiles.As one of the standards setters in China's aluminum-plastic co-extrusion industry, we actively participate in the formulation of national, industrial, and association standards, which fully demonstrates our technical leadership.Guided by our philosophy of "Singular Focus, Lasting Excellence," we are committed to providing reliable solutions through innovative technology and superior quality, thereby contributing to sustainable development in the global building industry.
htmlDescription:
Dongying Enternal New Type Building Materials Co., Ltd. - The Expert in Aluminum-Plastic Co-extrusion Profiles

Established in 2015 with a total investment of 35 million RMB, Dongying Enternal New Type Building Materials Co., Ltd. is a high-tech enterprise specializing in the R&D, manufacturing, sales, and technical services of aluminum-plastic co-extrusion profiles.

As one of the standards setters in China's aluminum-plastic co-extrusion industry, we actively participate in the formulation of national, industrial, and association standards, which fully demonstrates our technical leadership.

Guided by our philosophy of "Singular Focus, Lasting Excellence," we are committed to providing reliable solutions through innovative technology and superior quality, thereby contributing to sustainable development in the global building industry.

name: Property Automate
description: Property Automate is redefining property and facility management in Saudi Arabia – making it smarter, faster, and more connected.Built for Saudi and GCC enterprises, our solutions empower some of the region’s leading developers, owners, and commercial operators to manage their portfolios more efficiently and elevate operational performance across assets.Our flagship platform, propGOTO, streamlines operations through intelligent automation, extensive features, real-time insights, and intuitive tools.The future of property management is adaptive, automated, and data-driven – and with propGOTO, that future is already here.We’re not just offering software; we’re transforming how you manage, integrate, and optimize your operations.Our Purpose:Standardized & Smart OperationsStreamline lease, sales, facility, and community workflows with advanced, automated processes. Seamless Collaboration & EnablementConnect teams, tenants, and service providers for coordinated operations and faster decision-making. Innovative Platform ArchitectureLeverage a cloud-based, open API platform for seamless integration and high interoperability. Connected Property IntelligenceAccess property, finance, facility, and tenant information, with AI features for service and sales.
htmlDescription:
Property Automate is redefining property and facility management in Saudi Arabia – making it smarter, faster, and more connected.


Built for Saudi and GCC enterprises, our solutions empower some of the region’s leading developers, owners, and commercial operators to manage their portfolios more efficiently and elevate operational performance across assets.


Our flagship platform, propGOTO, streamlines operations through intelligent automation, extensive features, real-time insights, and intuitive tools.


The future of property management is adaptive, automated, and data-driven – and with propGOTO, that future is already here.


We’re not just offering software; we’re transforming how you manage, integrate, and optimize your operations.


Our Purpose:

  • Standardized & Smart Operations

Streamline lease, sales, facility, and community workflows with advanced, automated processes.

  • Seamless Collaboration & Enablement

Connect teams, tenants, and service providers for coordinated operations and faster decision-making.

  • Innovative Platform Architecture

Leverage a cloud-based, open API platform for seamless integration and high interoperability.

  • Connected Property Intelligence

Access property, finance, facility, and tenant information, with AI features for service and sales.

name: Dar Al Riyadh for Engineering Consulting Company

We believe in creating architecture that honors culture, fosters human connection, and paves the way for a sustainable future.From cultural landmarks to urban planning, we create culturally responsive spaces that honor identity, foster connection, and shape a hopeful futureWith over 45 years of landmark projects across 20+ countries, and our teams in Riyadh, Amman, and beyond, DAO has established a legacy of iconic designs that seamlessly blend heritage with modernityWe are Architects of legacy, designers of connection.
htmlDescription:
Dar Al Omran- Rasem Badran (DAO – Badran) is a group of multidisciplinary cities, buildings & Infrastructure consultants. We believe in creating architecture that honors culture, fosters human connection, and paves the way for a sustainable future.


From cultural landmarks to urban planning, we create culturally responsive spaces that honor identity, foster connection, and shape a hopeful future


With over 45 years of landmark projects across 20+ countries, and our teams in Riyadh, Amman, and beyond, DAO has established a legacy of iconic designs that seamlessly blend heritage with modernity


We are Architects of legacy, designers of connection.

name: Limpid Property Operations Pty Ltd
description: Limpid Property is an Australia-based real estate tech innovator, that is bringing immersive property technology to the Kingdom.Limpid Property’s Platform FirstVue™, A Game Changer for Property Sales. FirstVue adds a powerful tech dimension to how developments are marketed and sold in Saudi Arabia.The FirstVue™  platform helps visionary property developers save time, cut costs and sell their developments faster. Its interactive 3D sales suite allows agents and developers to showcase off-plan properties in rich detail from interactive site maps to virtual unit walkthroughs on touchscreens, tablets, or even via video calls. For Saudi developers, this means the ability to present new projects to buyers anywhere in the world with consistency and real-time availability. The platform centralizes all marketing assets and live inventory data, ensuring that whether a buyer is in Riyadh or abroad, they get the same engaging experience and up-to-date information. No more static brochures or cumbersome physical models FirstVue™ brings properties to life digitally, aligning perfectly with Saudi Arabia’s smart-city ambitions and modern buyer expectations.
htmlDescription:
Limpid Property is an Australia-based real estate tech innovator, that is bringing immersive property technology to the Kingdom.

Limpid Property’s Platform FirstVue™, A Game Changer for Property Sales. FirstVue adds a powerful tech dimension to how developments are marketed and sold in Saudi Arabia.

The FirstVue™ platform helps visionary property developers save time, cut costs and sell their developments faster. Its interactive 3D sales suite allows agents and developers to showcase off-plan properties in rich detail from interactive site maps to virtual unit walkthroughs on touchscreens, tablets, or even via video calls.

For Saudi developers, this means the ability to present new projects to buyers anywhere in the world with consistency and real-time availability. The platform centralizes all marketing assets and live inventory data, ensuring that whether a buyer is in Riyadh or abroad, they get the same engaging experience and up-to-date information. No more static brochures or cumbersome physical models FirstVue™ brings properties to life digitally, aligning perfectly with Saudi Arabia’s smart-city ambitions and modern buyer expectations.

name: Palazzo Morelli S.R.L.
description: Palazzo Morelli is an Italian company operating on a global scale, offering innovative solutions for high quality turnkey projects. Specialising in bespoke surfaces and furnishings, we guarantee the finest quality of Italian Craftsmanship.Palazzo Morelli also has two offices in London and Dubai, serving all countries in Europe and the Middle East and Gulf area, including Lebanon, Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates.Our identity is based on Italian excellence, combining craftsmanship and fine materials with the best Made in Italy tradition. Global innovation drives us to create pioneering solutions that transcend cultural and geographical boundaries, while integrated management ensures precise coordination of every step of the project, from concept to realisation.
htmlDescription:
Palazzo Morelli is an Italian company operating on a global scale, offering innovative solutions for high quality turnkey projects. Specialising in bespoke surfaces and furnishings, we guarantee the finest quality of Italian Craftsmanship.

Palazzo Morelli also has two offices in London and Dubai, serving all countries in Europe and the Middle East and Gulf area, including Lebanon, Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates.

Our identity is based on Italian excellence, combining craftsmanship and fine materials with the best Made in Italy tradition. Global innovation drives us to create pioneering solutions that transcend cultural and geographical boundaries, while integrated management ensures precise coordination of every step of the project, from concept to realisation.

name: Pass Wealth Management
description: Discover Your Path to Global FreedomExplore tailored residency, citizenship, real estate, and corporate solutions that empower you to achieve your ambitions — wherever life takes you.At Pass for Wealth Management, we connect individuals and investors with exclusive opportunities across Europe, the Caribbean, and the Middle East, offering a seamless path to European residency through real estate investment, second citizenship, and strategic wealth management.
htmlDescription:
Discover Your Path to Global Freedom



Explore tailored residency, citizenship, real estate, and corporate solutions that empower you to achieve your ambitions — wherever life takes you.


At Pass for Wealth Management, we connect individuals and investors with exclusive opportunities across Europe, the Caribbean, and the Middle East, offering a seamless path to European residency through real estate investment, second citizenship, and strategic wealth management.

name: Design International
description: Design International is a commercial architectural and design practice working globally and recognised for the masterplan and design of large-scale retail, leisure and mixed-use developments. At Design International, we are guided by a set of core values that underpin everything we do:People-Centric Thinking: We are passionate about people, and we put them at the centre of what we do. We believe that end users are the real key to measure the success of our designs and buildings.Innovative Design Delivered with Excellence: We continuously push the boundaries of architectural design to create transformative experiences.Sustainable Approach to Development: We are committed to deliver eco-friendly and sustainable design solution that enhance the quality of life and help the world.
htmlDescription:
Design International is a commercial architectural and design practice working globally and recognised for the masterplan and design of large-scale retail, leisure and mixed-use developments.

At Design International, we are guided by a set of core values that underpin everything we do:

  • People-Centric Thinking: We are passionate about people, and we put them at the centre of what we do. We believe that end users are the real key to measure the success of our designs and buildings.
  • Innovative Design Delivered with Excellence: We continuously push the boundaries of architectural design to create transformative experiences.
  • Sustainable Approach to Development: We are committed to deliver eco-friendly and sustainable design solution that enhance the quality of life and help the world.

name: Wire Collective
description: Wire Collective Ltd is an award-winning architectural visualization studio with offices in London, Valencia, and Italy. We specialize in crafting bespoke, high-impact images that go beyond technical renderings to tell a visual story, helping architects and developers communicate their vision with emotion and clarity.Our team of architects and 3D artists blends technical precision with cinematic artistry to create evocative, competition-winning imagery. Over the years, we’ve collaborated with renowned clients such as Foster + Partners, Zaha Hadid Architects, Benoy, PLP Architecture, and BDP, supporting their projects across the globe.From concept development to final delivery, we take pride in producing visual experiences that inspire.
htmlDescription:
Wire Collective Ltd is an award-winning architectural visualization studio with offices in London, Valencia, and Italy. We specialize in crafting bespoke, high-impact images that go beyond technical renderings to tell a visual story, helping architects and developers communicate their vision with emotion and clarity.

Our team of architects and 3D artists blends technical precision with cinematic artistry to create evocative, competition-winning imagery. Over the years, we’ve collaborated with renowned clients such as Foster + Partners, Zaha Hadid Architects, Benoy, PLP Architecture, and BDP, supporting their projects across the globe.

From concept development to final delivery, we take pride in producing visual experiences that inspire.

name: Simto Group Co., Ltd.
description: Simto Group Co.,Ltd.,located in Yongkang City,renowned as the "Door Capital of China",Zhejiang Province,was founded in 1995.It was elevated to a group company in 1998 and restructured into a joint-stock enterprise in 2024.building area of more than 500,000m,the company owns two major brands,"SIMTO"and "PORIYA".Simto Group is a full-service,modern door manufacturer that seamlessly integrates design,manufacturing,and international trade,offering  a one-stop product range including security doors,fireproof doors,high-end armored doors,villa doors,interior wooden  doors,WPC doors,medical doors,and smart locks."Simto Doors"has become synonymous with high-end security  brand,renowned for its exquisite craftsmanship and premium quality.Simto Group has been recognized as a National High-Tech Enterprise for its comprehensive door-making technology as  early as 2011,established several provincial-level R&D platforms,including an enterprise research institute,a high-tech  R&D center,and a postdoctoral workstation.The company undertakes key provincial R&D initiatives and major industrial  projects,included on the whitelist for state-sponsored foreign aid projects.
htmlDescription:
Simto Group Co.,Ltd.,located in Yongkang City,renowned as the "Door Capital of China",Zhejiang Province,was

founded in 1995.It was elevated to a group company in 1998 and restructured into a joint-stock enterprise in 2024.

building area of more than 500,000m,the company owns two major brands,"SIMTO"and "PORIYA".Simto Group is a

full-service,modern door manufacturer that seamlessly integrates design,manufacturing,and international trade,offering a one-stop product range including security doors,fireproof doors,high-end armored doors,villa doors,interior wooden doors,WPC doors,medical doors,and smart locks."Simto Doors"has become synonymous with high-end security brand,renowned for its exquisite craftsmanship and premium quality.


Simto Group has been recognized as a National High-Tech Enterprise for its comprehensive door-making technology as early as 2011,established several provincial-level R&D platforms,including an enterprise research institute,a high-tech R&D center,and a postdoctoral workstation.The company undertakes key provincial R&D initiatives and major industrial projects,included on the whitelist for state-sponsored foreign aid projects.

name: Kooheji Development
description: To be a trusted and admired developer that transforms spaces into extraordinary places — a catalyst for sustainable growth, architectural beauty, and the evolving needs of families and communities across the region. We envision a future where every Kooheji Development project sets a new standard for design, quality, and value, making a profound contribution to its surroundings and its people.We believe that human capital is the foundation of our success, and that innovation and uncompromising quality are the driving forces toward our future. With a united team spirit and values deeply rooted in our heritage, we work with passion and dedication to deliver exceptional projects that combine high quality with competitive value, contributing to the realization of the Kingdom’s Vision 2030.
htmlDescription:
To be a trusted and admired developer that transforms spaces into extraordinary places — a catalyst for sustainable growth, architectural beauty, and the evolving needs of families and communities across the region. We envision a future where every Kooheji Development project sets a new standard for design, quality, and value, making a profound contribution to its surroundings and its people.

We believe that human capital is the foundation of our success, and that innovation and uncompromising quality are the driving forces toward our future. With a united team spirit and values deeply rooted in our heritage, we work with passion and dedication to deliver exceptional projects that combine high quality with competitive value, contributing to the realization of the Kingdom’s Vision 2030.

name: Savills
description: Savills plc is a global real estate services provider listed on the London Stock Exchange. With a presence in the Middle East for over 40 years, Savills offers an extensive range of specialist advisory, management and transactional services across the United Arab Emirates, Oman, Bahrain, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia. Expertise includes property management, residential and commercial agency services, property and business assets valuation, and investment and development advisory. Originally founded in the UK in 1855, Savills has an international network of over 700 offices and associates employing over 40,000 people across the Americas, UK, Europe, Asia Pacific, Africa, and the Middle East.
htmlDescription:
Savills plc is a global real estate services provider listed on the London Stock Exchange. With a presence in the Middle East for over 40 years,

Savills offers an extensive range of specialist advisory, management and transactional services across the United Arab Emirates, Oman, Bahrain, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia. Expertise includes property management, residential and commercial agency services, property and business assets valuation, and investment and development advisory.

Originally founded in the UK in 1855, Savills has an international network of over 700 offices and associates employing over 40,000 people across the Americas, UK, Europe, Asia Pacific, Africa, and the Middle East.

name: Wakan Real Estate Development and Investment Company
Saudi Architects for Engineering Consulting Company
Yardi Systems Limited
description: Yardi delivers investment, asset and property management software built to support real estate companies of all sizes. Our cloud-based, mobile-ready solutions continue to evolve, helping developers, investors, owners and operators optimise performance across every stage of the real estate lifecycle.Tailored for the Middle East real estate industry, Yardi’s solutions support residential, commercial, retail and mixed-use assets through a unified platform, powered by accurate data, automated workflows and predictive insights. Our award-winning solutions enable property, asset and investment managers to automate processes, enhance efficiency, reduces costs and deliver business intelligence to minimize risk and support strategic decisions. Yardi integrates front and back office services, covering property management, accounting, leasing, maintenance, budgeting, forecasting, marketing, CRM, and more, into one unified solution.As one of the fastest-growing real estate technology providers in the Middle East, Yardi pairs global expertise with strong local support through dedicated regional teams and offices worldwide.
htmlDescription:
Yardi delivers investment, asset and property management software built to support real estate companies of all sizes. Our cloud-based, mobile-ready solutions continue to evolve, helping developers, investors, owners and operators optimise performance across every stage of the real estate lifecycle.

Tailored for the Middle East real estate industry, Yardi’s solutions support residential, commercial, retail and mixed-use assets through a unified platform, powered by accurate data, automated workflows and predictive insights. Our award-winning solutions enable property, asset and investment managers to automate processes, enhance efficiency, reduces costs and deliver business intelligence to minimize risk and support strategic decisions.

Yardi integrates front and back office services, covering property management, accounting, leasing, maintenance, budgeting, forecasting, marketing, CRM, and more, into one unified solution.

As one of the fastest-growing real estate technology providers in the Middle East, Yardi pairs global expertise with strong local support through dedicated regional teams and offices worldwide.

name: Glory Models
description: Glory Models, a leading enterprise in sand table model making in China, is renowned for its expertise, innovation, and commitment to excellence.With six strategic branches located in Hong Kong, Xiamen, Shenzhen, Shanghai, Chongqing and Fuzhou, Glory Models has 15,000 square meters of standard factory production space, reaches a production of over 50 models per month, and forms a comprehensive service network that integrates R & D, model design, production, intelligent technology, spatial art, and advanced visual exhibition systems.As a global supplier in architectural models, master planning models, landscape models, interior models, industrial models, mix used models, portable models and other sand table models, Glory Models is dedicated to creating added value for clients worldwide.
htmlDescription:
Glory Models, a leading enterprise in sand table model making in China, is renowned for its expertise, innovation, and commitment to excellence.

With six strategic branches located in Hong Kong, Xiamen, Shenzhen, Shanghai, Chongqing and Fuzhou, Glory Models has 15,000 square meters of standard factory production space, reaches a production of over 50 models per month, and forms a comprehensive service network that integrates R & D, model design, production, intelligent technology, spatial art, and advanced visual exhibition systems.

As a global supplier in architectural models, master planning models, landscape models, interior models, industrial models, mix used models, portable models and other sand table models, Glory Models is dedicated to creating added value for clients worldwide.

name: ModeScore Certification
description: At ModeScore, we believe mobility underpins how cities live and grow, shaping access, equity, and environmental performance. Our mission is to help organisations measure, benchmark, and improve how people move, using clear data to guide decisions, accelerate climate action and reduce emissions.The idea began with a simple question: how can we compare and improve mobility across places? Too often, transport is measured in isolation. ModeScore brings the whole picture together, analysing walking, cycling, public transport, and green logistics to create a single, evidence-based benchmark.Today, ModeScore is used globally across every real estate asset type to:Benchmark mobility performanceSupport low-carbon transport planning and deliveryStrengthen investment and ESG reporting with verifiable dataDemonstrate social and environmental impact to stakeholdersMobility is not a technical afterthought; it’s the cornerstone of sustainable urban development. When movement works, so do cities.
htmlDescription:
At ModeScore, we believe mobility underpins how cities live and grow, shaping access, equity, and environmental performance. Our mission is to help organisations measure, benchmark, and improve how people move, using clear data to guide decisions, accelerate climate action and reduce emissions.


The idea began with a simple question: how can we compare and improve mobility across places? Too often, transport is measured in isolation. ModeScore brings the whole picture together, analysing walking, cycling, public transport, and green logistics to create a single, evidence-based benchmark.

Today, ModeScore is used globally across every real estate asset type to:

Benchmark mobility performance

Support low-carbon transport planning and delivery

Strengthen investment and ESG reporting with verifiable data

Demonstrate social and environmental impact to stakeholders


Mobility is not a technical afterthought; it’s the cornerstone of sustainable urban development. When movement works, so do cities.

description: We are a studio creating interactive 3D & immersive experiences to market and sell off-plan real estate, before it's built.
htmlDescription: We are a studio creating interactive 3D & immersive experiences to market and sell off-plan real estate, before it's built.

name: AJi Saudi
description: AJi is one of the region’s leading architecture, engineering, construction, and consultancy firms, with a strong and expanding presence in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia through four offices across the Kingdom. Operating through 13 offices across the MENA region and backed by a 60-year legacy, AJi brings the expertise of 1,400 professionals working across 25 markets.In Saudi Arabia, AJi delivers integrated services across six sectors: Urban Environment, Wellness & Healthcare, Utilities & Environment, Mobility & Transportation, Eco-Futurism, and Advisory & Solutions. Our vision is rooted in three pillars that align closely with the Kingdom’s national development agenda: strengthening our legacy, investing in top talent, and partnering in shaping the region’s future.
htmlDescription:
AJi is one of the region’s leading architecture, engineering, construction, and consultancy firms, with a strong and expanding presence in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia through four offices across the Kingdom. Operating through 13 offices across the MENA region and backed by a 60-year legacy, AJi brings the expertise of 1,400 professionals working across 25 markets.

In Saudi Arabia, AJi delivers integrated services across six sectors: Urban Environment, Wellness & Healthcare, Utilities & Environment, Mobility & Transportation, Eco-Futurism, and Advisory & Solutions. Our vision is rooted in three pillars that align closely with the Kingdom’s national development agenda: strengthening our legacy, investing in top talent, and partnering in shaping the region’s future.
